alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 12:17PM CDT until May 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... South central Lincoln County in east central Missouri... East central Warren County in east central Missouri... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1217 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wright City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wentzville, Lake St. Louis, Warrenton, Wright City, Moscow Mills, Josephville, Chain of Rocks, Flint Hill, and Foristell. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 199 and 212. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
